actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.

official_title: Recognizing the importance of rivers to the United States and supporting efforts to inform and educate the people of the United States regarding rivers and the importance of their preservation.

summary.text: Recognizes the importance of rivers and streams to the Nation and supports activities to promote public education about river and stream preservation.

titles.title: Recognizing the importance of rivers to the United States and supporting efforts to inform and educate the people of the United States regarding rivers and the importance of their preservation.
